Key Match Events: Steven Kwan hit a double on the second pitch of the day
David Fry walked after a 3-2 pitch
Josh Naylor hit an RBI single
Reese Olson's first competitive pitch since Sept. 26 landed in the left-field bleachers for a 5-0 lead
Ty Madden's appearance fell apart with three walks and Fry's two-out, two-run double
Pre-Game Insights: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch mentioned the importance of reacting to unexpected situations
Tyler Holton, whose latest opening assignment quickly went awry, said 'This is going to be a fight to the finish'
Post-Match Reflections: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch said 'We're going to fight back'
Jake Rogers said 'It was just a tough day. That happens. It's baseball'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers' pitching chaos worked splendidly during an AL Wild Card Series sweep of Houston to get them here
The field was watered when the team came in to take ground balls, but not for the game, which caused a weird hop off the dirt
Others: The game was part of the AL Division Series
